DDL.statement: CREATE TABLE [dbo].[APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE] ( [EQUIPMENT_TYPE] varchar(15) NOT NULL, [DESCRIPTION] varchar(40) DEFAULT '' NULL, [WEIGHT_KG] decimal(18,3) DEFAULT 0.000 NULL, [ENABLED] varchar(1) DEFAULT 'Y' NULL )

ALTER TABLE [dbo].[APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK__APP_EQUI__4DFE8409737D9811] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([EQUIPMENT_TYPE]) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
CREATE TABLE [dbo].[APP_DESPATCH_EQUIPMENT_TYPE] ( [DESPATCH_NO] varchar(18) NOT NULL, [EQUIPMENT_TYPE] varchar(15) NOT NULL, [QUANTITY] int DEFAULT 0 NULL )

ALTER TABLE [dbo].[APP_DESPATCH_EQUIPMENT_TYPE] ADD CONSTRAINT [PK__APP_DESP__CA71DBADF6036324] PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED ([DESPATCH_NO], [EQUIPMENT_TYPE]) WITH (PAD_INDEX = OFF, STATISTICS_NORECOMPUTE = OFF, IGNORE_DUP_KEY = OFF, ALLOW_ROW_LOCKS = ON, ALLOW_PAGE_LOCKS = ON) ON [PRIMARY]
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[APP_PALLET] ADD [EQUIPMENT_TYPE] varchar(15) DEFAULT ''
UPDATE [dbo].[APP_PALLET] SET [EQUIPMENT_TYPE] = '';
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[APP_PALLET_HISTORY] ADD [EQUIPMENT_TYPE] varchar(15) DEFAULT ''
UPDATE [dbo].[APP_PALLET_HISTORY] SET [EQUIPMENT_TYPE] = '';
UPDATE APP_PALLET SET EQUIPMENT_TYPE = (SELECT EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM APP_MATERIAL where APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL = APP_PALLET.MATERIAL)
UPDATE APP_PALLET_HISTORY SET EQUIPMENT_TYPE = (SELECT EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM APP_MATERIAL where APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL = APP_PALLET_HISTORY.MATERIAL)
ALTER TABLE [dbo].[APP_DESPATCH] ADD [TOTAL_EQUIPMENT] numeric(38) DEFAULT 0
UPDATE [dbo].[APP_DESPATCH] SET [TOTAL_EQUIPMENT] = 0;

ALTER VIEW [dbo].[VIEW_PALLET_EXPIRY] AS (SELECT p.SSCC, p.LOCATION_ID, p.MATERIAL, p.BATCH_NUMBER, p.PROCESS_ORDER, p.QUANTITY, p.UOM, p.DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE, p.STATUS, p.EAN, p.VARIANT, p.DESPATCH_NO, p.CONFIRMED, p.LAYERS, p.SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE, p.CUSTOMER_ID, p.MHN_NUMBER, p.DECISION, b.EXPIRY_DATE, m.DESCRIPTION, m.OLD_MATERIAL, c.CUSTOMER_NAME, c.PRINT_ON_LABEL, p.DATE_CREATED, p.CREATED_BY_USER_ID, p.DATE_UPDATED, p.UPDATED_BY_USER_ID, P.EQUIPMENT_TYPE, m.GROSS_WEIGHT, m.NET_WEIGHT, m.WEIGHT_UOM, d.DATA as PART_NO, e.DATA as CASE_CONTENT, o.REQUIRED_RESOURCE as REQUIRED_RESOURCE FROM dbo.APP_PALLET AS p LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL_BATCH AS b ON p.MATERIAL = b.MATERIAL AND p.BATCH_NUMBER = b.BATCH_NUMBER LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL AS m ON p.MATERIAL = m.MATERIAL LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUSTOMER AS c ON p.CUSTOMER_ID = c.CUSTOMER_ID LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_PROCESS_ORDER AS o ON p.PROCESS_ORDER = o.PROCESS_ORDER LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA as d on d.MATERIAL = p.MATERIAL AND d.CUSTOMER_ID = p.CUSTOMER_ID and d.DATA_ID = 'PART_NO' LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL_CUSTOMER_DATA as e on e.MATERIAL = p.MATERIAL AND e.CUSTOMER_ID = p.CUSTOMER_ID and e.DATA_ID = 'CASE_CONTENT')

ALTER VIEW [dbo].[VIEW_PALLET_HISTORY] AS SELECT APP_PALLET_HISTORY.TRANSACTION_REF, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.TRANSACTION_TYPE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.TRANSACTION_DATE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.SSCC, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.LOCATION_ID, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.MATERIAL, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.BATCH_NUMBER, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.PROCESS_ORDER, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.QUANTITY, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.UOM, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.STATUS, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.EAN, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.VARIANT, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.DESPATCH_NO, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.USER_ID, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.CONFIRMED, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.LAYERS, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.CUSTOMER_ID, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.MHN_NUMBER, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.DECISION, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM dbo.APP_PALLET_HISTORY

ALTER VIEW [dbo].[VIEW_PALLET_HISTORY_EXPIRY] AS SELECT APP_PALLET_HISTORY.TRANSACTION_REF, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.TRANSACTION_TYPE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.TRANSACTION_SUBTYPE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.TRANSACTION_DATE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.SSCC, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.LOCATION_ID, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.MATERIAL, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.BATCH_NUMBER, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.PROCESS_ORDER, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.QUANTITY, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.UOM, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.DATE_OF_MANUFACTURE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.STATUS, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.EAN, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.VARIANT, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.DESPATCH_NO, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.USER_ID, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.CONFIRMED, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.LAYERS, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.SSCC_EXPIRY_DATE, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.CUSTOMER_ID, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.MHN_NUMBER, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.DECISION, APP_PALLET_HISTORY.EQUIPMENT_TYPE, APP_MATERIAL_BATCH.EXPIRY_DATE, APP_MATERIAL.DESCRIPTION FROM dbo.APP_PALLET_HISTORY LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL_BATCH ON APP_PALLET_HISTORY.MATERIAL = APP_MATERIAL_BATCH.MATERIAL AND APP_PALLET_HISTORY.BATCH_NUMBER = APP_MATERIAL_BATCH.BATCH_NUMBER LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_MATERIAL ON APP_PALLET_HISTORY.MATERIAL = APP_MATERIAL.MATERIAL

INSERT INTO SYS_MODULES (MODULE_ID, RF_ACTIVE, DK_ACTIVE, MODULE_TYPE, HINT, MNEMONIC, ICON_FILENAME, HELPSET_ID, REPORT_FILENAME, EXEC_FILENAME, EXEC_DIR, PRINT_PREVIEW, PRINT_DIALOG, PRINT_COPIES, REPORT_TYPE, RESOURCE_KEY, AUTO_LABELLER_COMMAND_FILE, AUTO_LABELLER_LABEL_FILE) VALUES ('FRM_ADMIN_DESPATCH_EQUIPMENT', 'N', 'Y', 'FORM', 'Despatch', 0, 'despatch.gif', '', '', '', '', 'Y', 'N', 1, '', 'mod_FRM_ADMIN_DESPATCH', '', '');

INSERT INTO SYS_MODULES (MODULE_ID, RF_ACTIVE, DK_ACTIVE, MODULE_TYPE, HINT, MNEMONIC, ICON_FILENAME, HELPSET_ID, REPORT_FILENAME, EXEC_FILENAME, EXEC_DIR, PRINT_PREVIEW, PRINT_DIALOG, PRINT_COPIES, REPORT_TYPE, RESOURCE_KEY, AUTO_LABELLER_COMMAND_FILE, AUTO_LABELLER_LABEL_FILE) VALUES ('FRM_ADMIN_EQUIPMENT_TYPE', 'N', 'Y', 'FORM', 'Equipment Admin', 0, 'equipment.png', '', '', '', '', 'Y', 'N', 1, '', 'mod_FRM_ADMIN_EQUIPMENT_TYPE', '', '');

INSERT INTO APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE (EQUIPMENT_TYPE, DESCRIPTION, ENABLED,WEIGHT_KG) SELECT DISTINCT(EQUIPMENT_TYPE),'Auto created' as DESCRIPTION,'Y' as ENABLED,30 AS WEIGHT_KG FROM APP_MATERIAL WHERE EQUIPMENT_TYPE > '' AND EQUIPMENT_TYPE NOT IN (SELECT EQUIPMENT_TYPE FROM APP_EQUIPMENT_TYPE)
